content.prompt: The Treasury of Petra in Jordan reflects the influence of other artistic traditions, which resulted from the importance of trade for Nabataean society through the inclusion of

choices.label: vegetal relief sculpture flanking the doorway
a band of Egyptian-influenced wall paintings
an arcade in the Imperial Roman style

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain why a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
